Mon., Sept. 24: ACLU of Mississippi art show and garden party

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

The ACLU of Mississippi invites you to Fight for Freedom at our art show and garden party on Monday, September 24.

Enjoy the sounds of the Southern Brass Band while viewing and hearing a showcase of visual and creative writing artists. This fundraiser will also include a silent art auction, delicious food stations, and the opportunity to gather with like-minded Mississippians on the need to extend freedom for all.

Fight For Freedom

Join us on Monday, September 24 as we bring together freedom fighters and art activists from across the state in order to create a better Mississippi.

Monday, September 24, 5:30 p.m.
Mississippi Museum of Art
380 S. Lamar Street
Jackson, MS 39201

RSVP TODAY


Your support is very important to us as we continue to stand in the gap for all Mississippians to make societal impacts for a better state. We look forward to seeing you there,

Jennifer Riley-Collins
